long_description: Lightweight bindings for advanced skiers up to 235 lbs., the Atomic FFG 10 downhill ski bindings offer tough steel housings for any type of skiing. Oversized platforms allow excellent energy transfer to steer today's wide skis. Brakes are designed for modern skis and won't hang up when skiing backward or landing switch. Automatic toe height mechanism compensates for any change in boot sole height due to wear and tear. Final DIN settings factor skier height, weight, boot platform size, age and ability; the 3 - 10 DIN release range is appropriate for most advanced adult skiers. Brake width fits skis up to 100mm wide at the waist.
short_description: Lightweight bindings for advanced skiers up to 235 lbs., the Atomic FFG 10 downhill ski bindings offer tough steel housings for any type of skiing.
